Installation of Gnome Shell Themes:: Backup /usr/share/gnome-shell/theme folderExtract the archive and rename gnome-shell to themeCopy this folder to /usr/share/gnome-shell/Restart Gnome Shell by hitting Alt+F2, then type 'r' and Press EnterYou can also use Gnome Tweak Tool to install directly from zip file
